name: Do Dham confluence- Gangotri and Yamunotri
description:
Embark on a spiritual journey, where the path is laden with mesmerising hot springs, divine beauty and breath-taking visions of snow-capped mountains. With this package, have a surreal experience of making rice Prasad by the gushing natural hot fountain, offering Poojas at the most revered places of worship and sinking in the celestial sights of the Himalayan Ranges.

Through this mystical tour, get to see the legendary place where Lord Shiva sat when he embraced the Ganga in his matted lock and tour through the magnetic Place of Sages. All in all, a truly divine experience.
